div.div: at Gettysburg, PA | Shirk at Musselman

tr.td: F&M wins toss, defers, Bullets to defend north end zone
Chris Bennett kickoff 50 yards to the GC15, Aden Twer return 0 yards to the GC15 (Troy Harrison).
Kody Smith rush for 5 yards to the GC20 (John Gandolfo;Kenny Provost).
Ted Delia rush for 4 yards to the GC24 (C.T. Marsh).
Kody Smith rush for 8 yards to the GC32, 1ST DOWN GC (Mike Shin).
Kody Smith pass complete to Peter Fessenden for loss of 6 yards to the GC26.

Kody Smith pass intercepted by Mike Shin at the GC44, Mike Shin return 0 yards to the GC44.
Frank Strumolo rush for 9 yards to the GC35 (Larry DelViscio).
